content: A judge ruled on Wednesday that Arista Networks Inc successfully redesigned its ethernet switches so that they do not infringe on a patent owned by Cisco Networks Inc  handing Arista its latest victory in a long-running intellectual property battle with its larger rival.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: Arista notches another win in Cisco networking patent fight

content: June 1 Arista Networks Inc won a ruling on Thursday in its legal battle with Cisco Systems Inc over networking device technology  setting the stage for Arista to undo a U.S. agency's order blocking importation of some of its products.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: Arista wins round in Cisco patent fight over network technology

content: SAN FRANCISCO A U.S. jury on Wednesday handed Arista Networks Inc a major win in a wide-ranging legal battle against Cisco Systems Inc  ruling that Arista owed no damages over Cisco's claims of copyright infringement.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: U.S. jury sides with Arista over Cisco in copyright battle

content: U.S. customs officials ruled that Arista Networks Inc can import redesigned ethernet switches that had been banned by the International Trade Commission  reducing pressure on Arista as it battles allegations of intellectual property infringement made by rival Cisco Systems Inc.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: U.S. Customs sides with Arista amid Cisco patent allegations

content: Nov 21 U.S. customs officials ruled that Arista Networks Inc can import redesigned ethernet switches that had been banned by the International Trade Commission  reducing pressure on Arista as it battles allegations of intellectual property infringement made by rival Cisco Systems Inc.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: U.S. Customs sides with Arista amid Cisco patent allegations

name: Arista Networks Inc

content: A federal judge has put on hold an antitrust case filed by Arista Networks Inc against rival Cisco Systems Inc  saying that Arista has not shown a delay would allow Cisco to perpetuate its "monopoly power" over consumers and competitors.
name: Arista Networks Inc
title: Judge pauses Arista antitrust case against Cisco

content: NEW YORK The U.S. Trade Representative has upheld an import ban on Arista Networks Inc's ethernet switches following a federal commission's finding in June that the company's products infringed patents owned by rival Cisco Systems Inc  Cisco said.

content: NEW YORK  Aug 23 The U.S. Trade Representative has upheld an import ban against certain Arista Networks Inc  products following a June decision by a federal trade agency finding that the company's products infringed several patents owned by rival Cisco Systems Inc  Cisco said in a Monday blog post on the company's website.

title: Import ban on Arista devices approved by USTR  Cisco says
